name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Hostname
description: This is a repository of hostname APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: SendGrid
apis.description: Delivering your transactional and marketing emails through the worlds largest cloud-based email delivery platform. Send with confidence.

apis.name: Tumblr
apis.description: Tumblr is a place to express yourself, discover yourself, and bond over the stuff you love. Its where your interests connect you with your people.

apis.name: AWS OpsWorks
apis.description: AWS OpsWorks is a configuration management service that uses Chef, an automation platform that treats server configurations as code. OpsWorks uses Chef to automate how servers are configured, deployed, and managed across your Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instances or on-premises compute environments. OpsWorks has two offerings, AWS Opsworks for Chef Automate, and AWS OpsWorks Stacks.
